name: Battery Percentage Versie 1.0
description: Displays the battery percentage in digital form on the toolbar or its own floating window, and sends smart notifications.

name: Google AI Studio - File Reader
description: Converts Google AI Studio File into an easy-to-read text file

name: New Tab Organizer 1.1
description: A customizable startpage with your bookmarks and notes.

name: NotebookLM Source Uploader 1.2
description: Automates adding multiple website or YouTube links to Google NotebookLM.

name: YouTube Playlist Collector
description: Collects video links from the current YouTube playlist tab and exports them to a downloadable CSV file.

name: Youtube Rightclick
description: Easily add YouTube video URLs to a CSV list via right-click or toolbar button. Quick capture for content curators & researchers.

name: Zeer Praktische Klok Versie 1.2
description: A customizable digital clock that always stays on top

name: Account Migration
description: Deze tool is ontworpen om de volledige inhoud (mappen en bestanden) van het ene Google Drive-account naar het andere te migreren, met behoud van de oorspronkelijke mappenstructuur.

name: Custom Data Tree
description: Build your own datatree.

name: DocLog One
description: Gmail DocLog One is a Google Workspace add-on for Gmail that helps you automatically log information about email attachments and links into a Google Sheet.

name: email-to-md
description: This Gmail Add-on allows you to select all emails with a specific label, convert them sequentially into a single Markdown file, and save that file to your Google Drive.

name: File Rename
description: Rename files in your Google Drive. Two main functionalities: removing prefixes from filenames and renaming multiple files in a sequential order.

name: Gmail-to-Sheet
description: This Gmail Add-on allows you to select emails with a specific label and export key data (sender, date, time, subject, and plain text body) to a new Google Sheet file in your Google Drive.

name: Google Drive Add-ons
description: Map Info Viewer, Footnote Remover

name: Job-Discovery-Engine
description: Dit project is een "zelflerende" command-line applicatie die je helpt jobaanbiedingen te ontdekken die écht bij je passen. In plaats van te filteren op harde criteria, leert de applicatie je impliciete voorkeuren door middel van een feedback-cyclus en AI-analyse.

name: Link-in-bio-Hub
description: Een met Firebase gebouwde mobile first webapplicatie voor het centraliseren van social media links.

name: Linux Partitie Analyser
description: Analyseert de Crostini Linux-omgeving op een Chromebook. Inventariseert handmatig geïnstalleerde Debian-pakketten, node_modules-mappen en de home-directory. De Google Gemini API genereert intelligente inzichten, samenvattingen en gepersonaliseerde onderhoudstips.

name: Longevity Food Health data tree
description: Een datatree over Longevity, Health & Food.

name: OCR combi
description: A Google Workspace Add-on for Google Drive that streamlines the process of text recognition (OCR) and document merging.

name: URL-pulse
description: A monitoring tool automated with GitHub Actions that checks the status of URLs and reports on them.

name: Vegan BioTech Report
description: Een geautomatiseerd rapport dat data verzamelt en presenteert, draaiend op GitHub Actions.

name: YouTube Playlist 2-Way Collector
description: Collect videos from YouTube playlists and save them to a Google Sheet. Edit / Re-arrange your playlists in the Google Sheet and save the changes back to YouTube.

name: YouTube Playlist Collector
description: Downloads all the video-links of each and everyone of your YouTube playlists into a Google Sheet by the means of the official YouTube/Google API's.

name: AutiWiki
description: Een wiki over autisme.

name: Kanban Pro
description: Kanbanboard. Kanban functionaliteit niet volledig afgewerkt, vooral een showcase van mijn architecturale full-stack vaardigheden.Stack: Java (Spring Boot), React (TypeScript), PostgreSQL & Docker. Gehost op Render; de applicatie kan na inactiviteit traag opstarten.

name: Portfolio
description: Mijn portfolio website.

name: Portfolio Vite
description: Mijn portfolio website gebouwd met Vite.
